code: export function calcTimeByPosition(yPosition,hourBlockHeight){var time=yPosition/hourBlockHeight;time=Math.floor(time*2)/2;var hour=Math.floor(time);var minutes=(time-Math.floor(time))*60;return{hour:hour,minutes:minutes};}export function buildTimeString(){var hour=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;var minutes=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var date=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'';return(date+" "+hour.toString().padStart(2,'0')+":"+minutes.toString().padStart(2,'0')+":00").trimStart();}export function calcTimeOffset(hourBlockHeight,hour,minutes){var now=new Date();var h=hour!=null?hour:now.getHours();var m=minutes!=null?minutes:now.getMinutes();return(h+m/60)*hourBlockHeight;}
